ProjectTitle: Investigating investigations. Political expectations in the late medieval Low Countries
InitialFeedbackHistory:
14/03/2024
Please describe in your DMP how you manage data underlying your publications and thesis, the publications and thesis are not in the scope of the DMP. 
Which documentation/metadata will you use in the database, is this publicly available? Under sharing you mention RDR, which data will you share there,  the database or the reports?

26/02/2024
The DMP is a bit too short and could use some additions. Especially section 1: data description needs more attention as it is not clear which kind of data will be created or reused during the research project. When this section is cleared up it will be easier to fill in the rest of the DMP. Please reach out to the RDM Helpdesk (rdm@kuleuven.be) if you would like to book an appointment with an RDM expert to discuss the DMP or if you need any advice on completing the DMP.
